review: This thing rules. Plain and simple. The set up was extremely easy. The packaging was simple, the instructions were extremely user-friendly, and the setup was painless. I was streaming YouTube videos in a few minutes. If you're reading this and need a laugh, you should watch the Apparently Kid videos and then look up the Macho Man Randy Savage interviews. OOOOHHHH YEAAAAHHHH
